Articles.Content:
Hello guys,

I am new to this forum.

KSP is really nice game.

I have a question. This will be my 6th or 7th post and I see that my posts are still under moderator review. Can somebody put me in that normal group please ?

Thank you

Hello guys,

I am new to this forum.

KSP is really nice game.

I have a question. This will be my 6th or 7th post and I see that my posts are still under moderator review. Can somebody put me in that normal group please ?

Thank you

Nope you are not under moderator review anymore.

Anyway this is switched automatically by the forum, it's not controlled by us. You are automatically taken out of the moderated usergroup after you have three registered posts. However some forums don't add to your post count and you'll stay there if you post in those forums (like the Space Lounge for example)

Anyway, welcome aboard!

Hello

Thank you for the reply.

It is woking now.

But as I wrote. There was some problem. As I wrote my 4th or 5th post on this forum and the post was still under review. So maybe some delay.

Anyway thank you very much.

Have a nice day

Btw a quick introduction.

I love space sim and space action games.

I love games like Eve Online and Freespace 2. I am playing those two games in my free time.

I created a few Star Gate ships for Freesapce 2. They are my private work and those ships are not for public release as my Truespace and 3D Studio Max skills are just on "hobby level"

So and now I am here playing KSP. I must say it is a wonderful game. This game is fulfilling my dreams Thank you guys for such a great game.

Only negative is memory limit. There are so many great plugins/mods.

Edited March 10, 2014 by Jovzin

Welcome to the black hole of no-lifeing called KSP, may many sleep less nights come your way in your pursuit of space glory!

If ya need any help with planes just PM me

Little programming joke that sucks:

"So my friend asks me, "What is multi-threading?" I say, "You know how KSP is? It's nothing like that at all."

Welcome to ze forums, where you will waste your life and die make lots of friends.
Hello and Welcome to Kerbal Science Enrichment Center! You have signed up for Explosive Portal Testing Initiative. lol enough of that but yes welcome!
